languages.text: {n}Вигдис, перехватившая вокс-канал у Равора, при ваших словах едва слышно кашляет — или усмехается?{/n} "Я рада, что сложившаяся ситуация не изменила ваше душевное расположение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис едва слышно кашляет — или усмехается?{/n} "Я рада, что сложившаяся ситуация не изменила ваше душевное расположение".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис, перехватившая вокс-канал у Равора, при ваших словах едва слышно кашляет — или усмехается?{/n} "Я рада, что сложившаяся ситуация не изменила ваше душевное расположение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis coughs lightly — or was it a laught?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't changed your state of mind."
{n}Vigdis coughs lightly — or was it a laught?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't changed your state of mind."
{n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."
{n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."
{n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道。听到你的话之后，她微微咳嗽一声，或者是笑了一声？{/n}“很高兴您在这种情况下依然能保持沉着冷静。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道。听到你的话之后，她微微咳嗽一声，或者是笑了一声？{/n}“很高兴您在这种情况下依然能保持沉着冷静。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, que ha tomado el control del canal de voco de Ravor, tose suavemente ante tus palabras... ¿o se ha reído?{/n} «Me alegro de que la situación actual no haya afectado a su compostura».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, que ha tomado el control del canal de voco de Ravor, tose suavemente ante tus palabras... ¿o se ha reído?{/n} «Me alegro de que la situación actual no haya afectado a su compostura».

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, die den Vox-Kanal von Ravor übernommen hat, hustet leicht bei dem Klang deiner Worte … oder war es ein Lachen?{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass die gegenwärtige Situation Eure Gelassenheit nicht beeinträchtigt."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, qui a remplacé Ravor sur le canal-vox, tousse faiblement en entendant vos paroles... à moins qu'il ne s'agisse d'un rire ?{/n} « Je me réjouis que la situation actuelle n'ait pas entamé votre calme. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, qui a remplacé Ravor sur le canal-vox, tousse faiblement en entendant vos paroles... à moins qu'il ne s'agisse d'un rire ?{/n} « Je me réjouis que la situation actuelle n'ait pas entamé votre calme. »

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだヴィグディスは、こちらの言葉を聞いて軽く咳き込んだ…いや、笑ったのだろうか？{/n}「今回の件で、お気持ちが乱れていないようでよかったです」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだヴィグディスは、こちらの言葉を聞いて軽く咳き込んだ…いや、笑ったのだろうか？{/n}「今回の件で、お気持ちが乱れていないようでよかったです」

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un yerine kanala giren Vigdis, sözlerinin üzerine ince ince öksürüyor. Hatta... Gülüyor mu yoksa?{/n} "İçinde bulunduğumuz durumun itidalinize tesir etmemiş olması hoş."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis, who has taken over the vox-channel from Ravor, coughs lightly at the sound of your words — or was it a laugh?{/n} "I'm glad the current situation hasn't affected your composure."
